channel.title: Need help
channel.description: 1. How to make commands i hawe command maker but i dont know how to work with it plz help my. 2. And how to edit existence command? Thank you if you help me

item.title: Need help
item.dc:creator: @mwiebelhaus mwiebelhaus
item.description:
@mwiebelhaus wrote:

All commands are in the client.java usually open client.java with a text pad then search for whatever the command is whioch would be whatever is in front of the ::
if you want to delete the command highlight everything before else if and then to the last } before the next else if.
If there is not another else if it just means there is not another command.

Most command makers save the command to a text file that has nothing to do with the whole source you have to open up the file and copy the command to your client.java in the right spot

[br][size=1]Posted on: July 09, 2007, 08:32:31 AM[/size][hr]You can change npc “talking” in npchandler.java

Read full topic

item.title: Need help
item.dc:creator: @Owner_Reaper Owner Reaper
item.description:
@Owner_Reaper wrote:

Instead of using a command maker learn to make one by your self.
Teh command maker, btw, puts all does commands in a .txt file. find it. But learn how to make them yourself, thats how you get better in java, ad then you wouldnt ask these questions
